Events that occurred on 30 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 165.
1966 - Actor Marton Csokas is born.
1969 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Paul Bibire
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 339, published in The Daily Telegraph as "Beautiful place because trees are loved".
1972 - Mythcon 3 begins in Long Beach, California.
2003 - The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: Shadow and Flame is published.
2004 - War and the Works of J.R.R. Tolkien is published.
2009 - Languages, Myths and History is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
About this time, Gandalf on his way to Bree encounters Radagast, who informs him that the Nazg√ªl are abroad.
